product_name: adidas Terrex Stockhorn Fleece Hoodie - Men's
long_description: The ultimate performance fleece, the men's adidas Terrex Stockhorn Fleece Hoodie with Cocona(R) manages moisture and odor as it keeps you warm on fast, fun hikes to the summit. Cocona fabric technology uses activated carbon from recycled coconut shells for moisture-releasing cooling, odor resistance and UPF 50+ UV protection. 100% polyester fleece has a durable exterior and a brushed interior. The men's adidas Terrex Stockhorn Fleece Hoodie features Formotion(R) body-hugging fit and preshaped arms that enhance movement, comfort and performance. Thumbholes hold cuffs down over hands for increased warmth. Zippered hand pockets; zippered bicep pocket.
